summary: Put all that time and effort spent on training to good use. Share your knowledge with everyone in  Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Become a skill trainer and share your knowledge with everyone in Skyrim.

[img]http://i1367.photobucket.com/albums/r781/MimiTheAlchemist/Skyrim%20Mods/SkillTrainer/skilltrainer_zps8fcd52cf.jpg[/img]

Just approach any NPC, and ask if they're interested in learning a new skill.

* There are three types of skills that the NPCs will choose from:
-- Battle Skill - One handed, Two handed, Archery, Block, Smithing, and Heavy Armor
-- Magic Skill - Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Enchanting, Illusion, and Restoration
-- Thievery Skill - Sneak, Lockpicking, Pickpocket, Speechcraft, Light Armor, and Alchemy

* To teach others a skill, you must have reached level 75 of the skill.
* Not everyone in Skyrim will need your services. They will politely refuse your offer.
* You can only train a NPC in a skill once an hour. For example, If you train Ysolda in archery, you'll have to wait another hour to teach her or any other NPC archery again.
* You don't see the progress bar or hear the sound when an NPC gains a skill level. To check the NPCs skill level, target the NPC and enter the console command "getav skillname" without the quotes. Substitute skillname with the name of the actual skill you want to check. ie: alchemy, marksman, sneak, etc.

To install:
Extract the contents of the zip file into skyrim's data folder.
This mod requires Skyrim's latest update.

!!New!!
Announcing Become a Skill Trainer Update.
*There are two different versions:
The original version (you have to have over 75 in a skill to train)
The easy version (you have to have over 50 in a skill to train)
*A perk will also be taught during training.
*There is an optional file to train followers for free.

Future plans for this mod:
fully voiced - subtitles on for now
master level skill training for those with skills leveled up to 100 - triple the gold

I hope you enjoy my mod.
